title: For These New York Farmers, Harvest Time Means High Times
description: In fields from Sag Harbor to Ithaca, a new crop ripened this fall: cannabis plants grown for recreational marijuana.
dc:creator: John Ortved and Paul Barbera
media:credit: Paul Barbera for The New York Times
media:description: In the 1930s, the growing of cannabis was all but banned across the United States.
